# Appendix

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

quiet <- capture.output({
#-----------------------------------------------
# obligatory to append to the top of each script
renv::activate(project = here::here())
source(here::here("_common.R"))
#-----------------------------------------------
}) 

commit_hash <- system("git rev-parse HEAD", intern=TRUE)

# Hash algorithm picked based on https://csrc.nist.gov/projects/hash-functions
hash_algorithm <- "sha256"

raw_file <- here::here("data_raw",data_in_file)
raw_file_digest <- digest::digest(file = raw_file, algo = hash_algorithm)

processed_file <- here::here("data_clean",data_name)
processed_file_digest <- digest::digest(file = processed_file, algo = hash_algorithm)

```

This report was built on code from the commit hash `r paste0("\"",commit_hash,"\"")`  in the [`CoVPN/correlates_reporting`](https://github.com/CoVPN/correlates_reporting) repository.

The raw input file, `r paste0("\"",data_in_file,"\"")`'s `r hash_algorithm` hash sum is `r raw_file_digest`.

The processed file, `r paste0("\"",data_name,"\"")`'s `r hash_algorithm` hash sum is `r processed_file_digest`.
